byline.original: By LYDIA POLGREEN AND HARI KUMAR

abstract: On ego problems in Congress and his own camp, yoga breathing and why democracy needs people of character.
snippet: On ego problems in Congress and his own camp, yoga breathing and why democracy needs people of character.
lead_paragraph: When we arrived in Anna Hazare's village, the famous Ralegan Siddhi in rural Maharashtra, late last week, an aide had a curt message for us. Anna-ji, he said icily, was recovering from a long journey the previous day and would not be receiving any visitors.
